description: black and grey ink, gold leaf on cream paper; large black wave along bottom and rising on right side; grey band of waves with cream lines detailing curls of water above black wave; across and above black wave is cream lines detailing water in LLC: black and cream lines rising into wave-like shape with circular area at center; grey butterfly at center of hole in black and cream wave pattern; grey and cream curling pattern area above water (clouds or spray from water?); large gold crescent moon with subtle circular stamping to indicate rest of moon in upper center; gold butterfly to right of moon; bottom edge of paper has rough texture
medium: Woodblock print; ink and gold leaf on paper
signed: LRC in pencil: Reika Iwami | LRC in pencil: \'91 |bottom center in pencil: (Japanese characters) C
title: Crescent Moon and Sea C
